name: Megathrust
description:
A Journey of Heroism and Humanity as an Intern in Emergency Medical Services During Natural Disasters

Themed in the city of Jakarta that sinking in 2030 Experience the challenges and pressures of real-life emergency response in a simulated environment.

Through gameplay, the player can learn about the different stages of emergency response, from assessing the situation and triaging patients to providing first aid and coordinating with other emergency responders. They can also learn about the specific challenges that come with responding to a natural disaster such as an earthquake, such as dealing with infrastructure damage, communication breakdowns, and widespread injuries.

This game project is still under development and will be release on steam (PC) ,so we will update an explanation about this game in the future! Stay Tuned!
